title: Is There a Catholic Case for Capitalism? | Ep 53
description:
I address some of the flaws in a recent NC Register piece alleging that capitalism is not only compatible with Catholic social teaching, but it is preferred!

Previous episodes mentioned:
On the Horn vs Rocha Debate | Ep 51
Review Preview: Can a Catholic Be a Socialist? | Ep 50
Trent Horn's Catholic Critique of Socialism | Ep 40
